title: Elementary Science Teacher Leadership Capacity Development Through Networked Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science subject knowledge and school field experience
context.additional_context: Leadership program for science teachers operated by vocational training institutions, providing a collaborative learning environment using real-time video conferencing systems.

learning_goals: Participants can share three or more science class innovation cases through networking with peer teachers.
Participants develop at least two problem-solving strategies for real-world school scenarios using online collaboration tools.
Participants establish personalized development plans based on a science education leadership competency diagnosis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
